price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri, ntushobora gutuma ibipfamutima bitanyurwa vyumva ukuri bikagukurikira; eka ntushobora no gutuma ibipfamatwi vyumva ubutumwa bikabutegera mu gihe bigenjeje umugongo bikwirengagiza[17];
arabic: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
footnotes: [17] Ntumwa y’Imama! Ntugatuntuzwe rero n’ukubona ababangikanyamana batakwemera ngo bagukurikire, kuko bo ni nk’ibiragi ntibumva; ni nk’abapfuye, ntibanyurwa namba n’aho boba bari hambavu yawe, nkeswe rero mu gihe baguhunga ngo ntibumve n’ubutumwa ubashikiriza.

meta.transliteration: fa-innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
